name: Stick to the border
description:
You are a space traveller who escapes from enemies into space. Run away as fast as possible... But be careful, because your ship has been damaged.

Too little speed will guarantee you an encounter with your attackers, while too much speed will guarantee you a walk in the void.

Good luck!

Made for: Space-Jam 2023

Autorstwa:

  • Krzysztof Pacek
  • Przemysław Kubik
  • Natalia Ziomek
